items.title: Entry Level Sales - Part Time Work from Home $18.00 Base Pay Per Appt.
items.content:
Entry Level Sales - Part Time Work from Home
Vector Marketing is filling remote sales positions. Primary responsibilities include working with customer, selling our Cutco products, and writing up any orders. There is a base pay not based on sales, but reps have an opportunity to earn more based on commission. Previous experience is not required.
We provide flexible schedules for anyone looking to make some extra income around their current schedule.
Position Details:
Excellent pay competitive starting base pay, commissions available based on performance
Solid training we teach our reps how to do well in this role before they start, and offer continued support and additional training as time goes on.
Flexible scheduling we help our reps create a schedule that works best for them. Some work as much as possible, some work for just the summer, while others choose to be super part time around other commitments such as other jobs.
Basic Requirements:
Enjoy working with people
At least 18 years old or 17 and a HS Graduate in 2020
Conditions apply
Able to start within the next 7 10 days
Willing to learn and apply new skills.
Who would do well:
People who have done well with us in the past have had experience in retail, fast food, cashier, call center, administrative assistant, receptionist, office work, landscaping, and in just about any field you can imagine. We welcome all applicants who have a positive attitude and enjoy working with people.
This entry level sales position is a great fit for people who are looking for part time or a full time opportunity. If you are a student looking for summer work or just someone who is looking for a flexible schedule, our opportunities can work around your needs.
If you think you would be a great fit for our sales team fill out the contact information and a receptionist will follow up with you about setting up a virtual interview with a manager. We encourage applicants of all ages and experience, as we do not discriminate on the basis of an applicant s age.

items.title: Program Officer, COVID-19
items.content:
Remote
  • Location: United States
  • Classifications: Temporary Remote

ABOUT AMERICARES

Americares is an international relief and development organization that saves lives and builds healthier futures for people affected by poverty or disaster in the U.S. and around the world. Every day, Americares puts critically needed medicines and supplies in the hands of frontline health workers and develops and supports innovative health improvements in their communities. We are the leading nonprofit for delivering donated medicines and medical supplies to health programs around the world increasing access to medicines in more than 90 countries every year.

POSITION SUMMARY:

Americares is seeking an experienced, dynamic Program Officer to implement Americares MHPSS COVID-19 programming, with a focus on the United States. Working in collaboration with members of Americares Technical Unit, Emergency Response and U.S. Program, the Mental Health and Psychosocial Support (MHPSS) Program Officer will engage frontline health workers and deliver a menu of MHPSS COVID-19 trainings and technical assistance. Additionally, the Program Officer will support Americares efforts to develop an online repository of pandemic focused MHPSS content and resources for broader utilization amongst members of the healthcare community.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Deliver Americares COVID-19 mental health programming to frontline health workers. This includes webinars as well as small group, facilitated trainings.
  • Work with pertinent programs staff to update Americares COVID-19 mental health trainings as needed for the evolving COVID-19 pandemic
  • As appropriate, conduct one-on-one crisis support sessions with frontline health workers and create referral pathways for continued care
  • Coordinate with Americares U.S. Program staff for partner outreach
  • Coordinate with existing mental health partners and build relationships with new partners to expand outreach efforts
  • As needed, determine obstacles for timely and impactful implementation and adapt as needed to meet program objectives
  • Coordinate with M&E and other program support roles to manage data collection and regular reporting for implemented mental health initiatives
  • Contribute to the development of Americares online repository of pandemic focused content and resources
  • Focus on quality assurance and technical assistance in mental health and psychosocial support services
  • Participate in and contribute to Americares Mental Health and Psychosocial Support Community of Practice

QUALIFICATIONS:

  • Advanced degree in psychology, social work or relevant field required with minimum 5 years of experience. Additional degrees/certification in public health, global health, international development, or equivalent a plus
  • Experience implementing mental health programming with health professionals, experience with safety net health professionals a plus
  • Demonstrated success with training including online training and distance facilitation
  • Experience in program development, relationship, and capacity building, monitoring and evaluation
  • Proficiency in English required, proficiency in a second language (especially Spanish, French, or Arabic) an advantage
  • Works well under pressure and in stressful situations
  • Extremely organized, flexible, and excellent communication skills
  • Certification in Psychological First Aid (may be done upon hire)
Apply for job

items.title: Technical Sales Lead / Sales Engineer (Americas) at Balena
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=2, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=8, bigdata-ml=8, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=16, frontend=0}
items.content:
Technical Sales Lead / Sales Engineer (Americas)

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Role: Embedded Developer
Industry: DevOps, Internet of Things, Software Development
Company size: 51–200 people
Company type: VC Funded
Company: Balena – No office location

Technologies

docker
iot
saas
iaas

Job description

On being a Technical Sales Lead or Sales Engineer at balena 

We run sales like we run engineering. While closing deals is important, we’re more interested in helping customers succeed with balena and solving their technical challenges. We’re also a process-driven team and work to make our sales process as efficient as possible.

We mostly focus on inbound sales, for now, understanding the needs of potential customers, helping them discover what about balena is most helpful for them, onboarding them to our platform, and ultimately helping them grow their business and scale their IoT fleets. We succeed when our customers succeed. This will be a full-time role.

Responsibilities

  • Identify and nurture leads from our user base, inbound requests, events, etc.
  • Engage with potential customers and guide them through their evaluation of balena by providing demonstrations, answering technical questions, and explaining how balena can address their specific needs
  • Maintain relationships with existing customers, help them continue to grow with balena, and take ownership of expansion, renewal and upgrade opportunities
  • Develop tools and methods for improving process efficiency and automation
  • Gather and share feedback from customers with the product and engineering teams
  • Manage extended customer projects (such as an enterprise proof of concept)

Requirements

  • Ability to understand and empathize with customer needs and requirements, and work directly with customers to address those needs
  • Willing and able to learn complex technical subjects and develop a deep understanding of the balena platform
  • Equally skilled at presenting to business executives and engineers
  • Highly organized, able to handle many threads at once, and keep things moving - you’ll be interacting with many different customers on any given day
  • Ability to navigate the sales process within organizations ranging from small startups to large multinationals
  • Self-motivated and able to drive results without too much management
  • Desire to make yourself and others more effective. You’re always looking for ways to improve the process
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills, and fluency in English

Bonus points

  • Technical or engineering background
  • Experience with balena-related technologies (e.g. Docker, Linux, IoT devices like the Raspberry Pi)
  • Experience working with IoT companies
  • Understanding (and healthy skepticism) of sales processes and best practices

To apply

Send us your CV/Resume and cover letter, with a focus on what you can bring to the team. Please include a paragraph in your cover letter about how you think sales leads/engineers can best help customers succeed, with examples if possible.

Apply

About Balena

Balena's mission to unlock the potential of physical computing by removing friction for IoT fleet owners. We believe that edge computing is the next major computing paradigm, and every new computing paradigm needs a scalable development platform to match. We're building that platform with a complete, end-to-end solution that makes it easy for any developer to build applications for IoT and the Edge.

Our software platform helps developers build, deploy and manage code on connected devices. We brought Docker to embedded GNU/Linux devices in 2013 and have been building our toolkit ever since. Our core product is the balenaCloud platform, but we also maintain a variety of successful open source projects including Etcher, openBalena, balenaOS and balenaEngine and made contributions to high-exposure projects such as Docker, Electron, and AppImage. We've also recently released our first hardware product, the balenaFin.

Our technology is open, standards-based, and proven in production across a wide range of scenarios from robotics, drones, smart buildings, 3D printing, agriculture, medicine, and more. Our investors include OpenView, Threshold Ventures, Aspect Ventures, GE, and Ericsson.

Balena is a highly distributed, remote-friendly company We rely on clear communication and the rule of "assume positive intent" to help us work together across time zones, cultures and first languages. As an organization, we have little hierarchy, and organize as needed to build complex features and solve big problems.

Benefits

  • Work with extremely talented, distributed team
  • Work remotely
  • Flexible working hours
  • Equipment of your choice
  • Annual company gathering in an international location
  • We send you hardware for side projects!

items.title: Contact Tracer, COVID-19 Contact Tracing Program
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=24, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=2, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Remote | Entry-level
  • Job Locations: US-Remote
  • Job ID: 2020-2009
  • Category: Research
  • Department: COVID-19 Contact Tracing Program

Overview

DISCLAIMER: AM LLC is NOT affiliated with higher-hire.us, who has re-posted our jobs and notified potential candidates of interviews and offers via text. You should ONLY apply for AM jobs via amllc.co or through a reputable job board such as indeed.com, monster.com, or careerbuilder.com. AM LLC is not responsible for any communication between higher-hire.us and our candidates, whether via text or phone.

AM has immediate openings for Contact Tracers to support state and local efforts to fight the COVID-19 Contact Tracing program, nationwide. High call-volume position. No travel required. This position will begin immediately.

Background: The scale and complexity of the COVID-19 outbreak has underscored the need for prompt and effective implementation of evidence-based containment measures. Contact tracing is one of the interventions that has been used to effectively control recent pandemics (Ebola, SARS), and has shown to be effective against COVID-19 mitigation in South Korea, New Zealand and elsewhere.

AM LLC has identified over 18,000 qualified and motivated candidates who have responded to our call to action to support COVID-19 response efforts. Our candidates are located throughout the U.S., come from a variety of backgrounds, and possess the skills and personal qualities necessary to work as Contact Tracers, Care Resource Coordinators, and Case Investigators.

The successful Contact Tracer will work remotely to conduct a virtual “needs check,” and connect at-risk COVID-19 positive patients and people in quarantine to community resources.

Responsibilities

  • Call contacts of newly-diagnosed patients
  • Communicate with contacts in a professional and empathetic manner
  • Collect and record information on symptoms into the CRM
  • Provide contacts with approved information on state/local quarantine procedures, and, if appropriate, refer them to testing according to protocol (and/or to a COVID-19 Care Resource Coordinator for social resources.)
  • Contact Tracers will follow the script to inform contacts about the importance of quarantine, and what to do if symptoms develop. They are not permitted to deviate from the script, or provide information that is not included in the script.
  • Contact tracers will be required to use their own telephone, computer and electronic equipment
  • Maintain daily contact with the supervisor

Qualifications

  • Ability to exhibit a professional, positive attitude and work ethic
  • Excellent interpersonal skills; ability to interact professionally with culturally diverse individuals during a time of crisis and distress
  • Ability to show empathy to distressed individuals
  • College degree or equivalent required
  • Excellent organizational and communication skills
  • Ability to speak, read, and write English
  • Second or multiple languages a plus (especially Spanish, Portuguese, French, Haitian-Creole, Mandarin, Cantonese, Bengali)
  • Critical thinking and sound judgment required
  • Ability to handle confidential information with discretion and professionalism
  • Technology requirements: PC with Windows 10, Antivirus Protection: Windows Defender and Windows Firewall; or Mac with Apple OS X 10.13, Antivirus Protection: Sophos; and personal mobile device to use for this job. (A headset is preferred.)

Note: Due to the high volume of applicants, we may be unable to respond to telephone or email inquiries, but we are reviewing and considering all applications in the order in which they were submitted on a rolling basis.

items.content:
Our top sales representative grossed over $100,000 in sales in just three months and never left their home. We offer a comprehensive and free e-commerce platform that gives you the tools to be successful online. If you want to be paid for your efforts and have the support of a corporate office but the flexibility of being self-employed, apply today.

At CBD BioCare, our mission is to educate about the healing powers of hemp and to get this product in the hands of those who need it the most. In order to accomplish this goal, we need people like you. If you are ready to make a change and be part of the fastest growing industry in the nation, then apply to learn more.

Here is what our sales representative program has to offer:

Ability to manage your own sales with a comprehensive dashboard to track and monitor your business.

Control your own schedule and earning potential.

Receive sales training and marketing materials.

Carry no sales inventory to hold or deliver.

The opportunity to earn referral fees (we are not a multi-level marketing company).

Receive commissions (up to 40%).

Associate with people who share your passion to educate about CBD.

Forbes Magazine estimates the CBD industry will grow to 2.1 billion dollars this year, that s up 700% from 2016. Are you ready to be one of the first to take advantage of this unique opportunity?

CBD companies are not equal--we offer full spectrum CBD, organically grown and manufactured in the USA at FDA approved facilities. We offer third party testing and company transparency.

We are not just selling CBD, we are building a CBD BioCare community, changing lives one bottle at a time.

Ready to take the next step? Apply TODAY!*

*Sales Representatives must be located in the U.S. Work/visa sponsorship is not available for this position.




Job Requirements:
  • strong communication skills
  • ability to work remotely
  • a passion for helping others
  • social media marketing experience a plus
  • e-commerce experience a plus

items.content:
Work from Home - Entry Level Sales Representatives

Vector Marketing is currently holding virtual interviews for entry level sales rep positions. Our representatives have an opportunity to work from home selling Cutco products through one on one appointments that emphasizes customer service. Experience is not necessary because our online training is designed to help people do well immediately - as long as someone is willing to learn, they can be successful.

We provide flexible schedules for anyone looking to make some extra income during this unpredictable time. This entry level sales position is a great opportunity for college students and 2020 high school graduates looking for summer work.

What we offer:
Excellent pay - competitive starting base pay, commissions available based on performance
Solid training - we teach our reps how to do well in this role before they start, and offer continued support and additional training as time goes on. (Many of our top representatives had never had a 'real' job before working with us.)
Flexible scheduling - we help our reps create a schedule that works for them. Some work as much as possible while others choose to be super part time around other commitments such as online classes or other jobs.
Choice of location - most interviews and trainings take place online through virtual interviews and training, reps can conveniently work from home.

What we require:
Enjoy working with people
At least 18 years old or 17 and a 2020 HS Graduate
Conditions apply
Able to start - at least on a part time basis - within the next 7 - 10 days
Willing to learn and apply new skills.

Who would do well:
People who have done well with us in the past have had experience in retail, fast food, cashier, call center or telemarketing (which by the way, we don't do), administrative assistant, receptionist/office work, landscaping, and in just about any field you can imagine. We welcome all applicants who have a positive attitude and are willing to work hard and learn new things.

This entry level sales position is a great fit for people who are looking for part time or a full time remote work. If you are a student looking for summer work or just someone who is looking for a flexible schedule, our opportunities can work around your needs. Because of the quality of our training, we're able to take on people who are still in school or who entered the job market right out of high school and train them to quickly become successful.

If you think you would be a great fit for our sales team fill out the contact information and a receptionist will follow up with you about setting up a virtual interview with a manager.PandoLogic. Category: Sales, Keywords: Sales Representative

items.title: Upright Labs: Sales Manager
items.content:
Sales Manager


Upright Labs is hiring a rockstar Sales Manager to grow our client base for our consulting services and software. In your role, you will be tasked with outreach, proposal writing, and resource creation. A typical week in this role will be 4 days per week sourcing, reaching out, and engaging with potential customers and 1 day per week working on marketing efforts to keep your sales funnel healthy. This is a remote role that can be based anywhere in the United States. 

What you'll do 

Sales/Lead Generation (80%) 
  • Develop and implement new sales initiatives, strategies, and programs to capture key demographics
  • Lead outreach to warm and cold sales leads by phone and email
  • Develop a deep understanding of our ideal customers and how they relate to our products and services
  • Identify and build out email automation flows to keep warm leads engaged with Upright Labs
  • Craft proposals for prospective clients and close five and six figure deal contracts
  • Re-engage past and existing clients to offer new services
  • Track and meet sales goals and report results on weekly basis

Marketing (20%) 
  • Craft blogs and resources to share with clients to keep them engaged
  • Craft and send out a monthly newsletter to existing and prospective clients and use engagement data to make improvements and follow up with clients
  • Engage in other marketing initiatives as needed

Who you are 
  • 5+ years experience in sales, business development, account management, or similar role
  • Experienced in cold outreach and sales management
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Dedication to providing exceptional customer service
  • Passionate about solving problems and educating potential customers
  • Process oriented - you solve the problem for today and tomorrow
  • Ability to grow and lead a sales team in the future
  • Ability to travel up to 25% of your time for events, conferences, and in person sales meetings
  • Experience with e-commerce and/or the secondhand retail space is considered a plus

What you'll get 
  • Work from your home or wherever you do your work best
  • The opportunity to work with a high caliber team at a growing start-up
  • The opportunity to build a sales organization from the ground up
  • Health insurance, 401k match
  • Generous vacation policy
  • Total compensation will consist of base salary plus commission

How to apply 

To apply please submit your application via this google form. Please note, candidates who do not submit the application form will not be considered. We are accepting applications on a rolling basis. We are committed to following up with all candidates and appreciate your interest! 

Upright Labs is a strong and flexible team because of the diverse backgrounds of our staff. This includes professional background, subject matter expertise, culture, race/ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, language, hobbies, etc. We strongly encourage women, minorities, and people from underrepresented backgrounds to apply. Your skills are needed here.

items.title: Helpjuice: Rapidly Growing SaaS - Account Manager / Inside Sales
items.content:
Rapidly Growing SaaS - Account Manager / Inside Sales

Who are we?
Helpjuice is a fast-growing knowledge base platform used by thousands of Enterprises (Amazon.com, Hertz, Glovo, Virgin Mobile, NGINX, & thousands more). We help companies SCALE their employee training & onboarding process aswell as their customer support.

Why Should You Join Us? 
  • Flexible, 100% Remote, bootstrapped team for 10+ years. 
  • Chance to work with directly a successful SaaS CEO w/ multiple exits. You will grow/learn a LOT, working directly with our CEO, Emil. 
  • Fast-Growing Product leader in our industry. You will have the opportunity to also learn how we build an addictive product that our customers love
  • Great, self-sufficient Team. 0 Bureaucracy, no dreadful meetings, no micro management. Just a group of amazing individuals that are self-sufficient, and helping each other succeed. 

What are we looking for?

What does the ideal candidate have?
You are:

items.title: Production Buyer
items.content:

Bonfire.com is transforming the way people buy and sell high quality custom apparel. We are a young, agile startup based in Richmond, VA growing by leaps and bounds. We’ve helped thousands of causes and organizations raise millions of dollars by selling their own shirts.

We are seeking a gifted and talented buyer to join our Production team. This role involves managing relationships with our current printing partners, sourcing/onboarding new partners, and strengthening our network by tracking and improving key partner metrics such as timing, quality, and pricing.

Details

Location: Remote
Average Hours: 20 hours/week expected

What you will do:

  • Onboard new print partners to match up our processes for sending orders, payments, and handle issues such as reprints.
  • Test product and print quality by ordering and evaluating physical samples.
  • Track our forecasted volume trends and partner capacities.
  • Work closely with our current partners to track and communicate metrics and resolve occasional issues.
  • Identify cost savings opportunities, get internal buy-in, and implement improvements.
  • Represent Bonfire with integrity and professionalism at all times in all written and oral communications.

What You Must Have:

  • Natural curiosity and passion
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills

  • The desire to meet and exceed measurable performance goals
  • The technical aptitude to master our systems and tools

You’re in good company (with a good company). We offer:

  • The ability to help make a difference in thousands of people’s lives

items.title: Technical Sales Lead / Sales Engineer at Balena
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=2, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=8, bigdata-ml=8, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=16, frontend=0}
items.content:
Technical Sales Lead / Sales Engineer

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Role: Embedded Developer
Industry: DevOps, Internet of Things, Software Development
Company size: 51–200 people
Company type: VC Funded
Company: Balena – No office location

Technologies

docker
iot
saas
iaas

Job description

On being a Technical Sales Lead or Sales Engineer at balena 

We run sales like we run engineering. While closing deals is important, we’re more interested in helping customers succeed with balena and solving their technical challenges. We’re also a process-driven team and work to make our sales process as efficient as possible.

We mostly focus on inbound sales, for now, understanding the needs of potential customers, helping them discover what about balena is most helpful for them, onboarding them to our platform, and ultimately helping them grow their business and scale their IoT fleets. We succeed when our customers succeed. This will be a full-time role.

Responsibilities

  • Identify and nurture leads from our user base, inbound requests, events, etc.
  • Engage with potential customers and guide them through their evaluation of balena by providing demonstrations, answering technical questions, and explaining how balena can address their specific needs
  • Maintain relationships with existing customers, help them continue to grow with balena, and take ownership of expansion, renewal and upgrade opportunities
  • Develop tools and methods for improving process efficiency and automation
  • Gather and share feedback from customers with the product and engineering teams
  • Manage extended customer projects (such as an enterprise proof of concept)

Requirements

  • Ability to understand and empathize with customer needs and requirements, and work directly with customers to address those needs
  • Willing and able to learn complex technical subjects and develop a deep understanding of the balena platform
  • Equally skilled at presenting to business executives and engineers
  • Highly organized, able to handle many threads at once, and keep things moving - you’ll be interacting with many different customers on any given day
  • Ability to navigate the sales process within organizations ranging from small startups to large multinationals
  • Self-motivated and able to drive results without too much management
  • Desire to make yourself and others more effective. You’re always looking for ways to improve the process
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills, and fluency in English

Bonus points

  • Technical or engineering background
  • Experience with balena-related technologies (e.g. Docker, Linux, IoT devices like the Raspberry Pi)
  • Experience working with IoT companies
  • Understanding (and healthy skepticism) of sales processes and best practices

To apply

Send us your CV/Resume and cover letter, with a focus on what you can bring to the team. Please include a paragraph in your cover letter about how you think sales leads/engineers can best help customers succeed, with examples if possible.

Apply

About Balena

Balena's mission to unlock the potential of physical computing by removing friction for IoT fleet owners. We believe that edge computing is the next major computing paradigm, and every new computing paradigm needs a scalable development platform to match. We're building that platform with a complete, end-to-end solution that makes it easy for any developer to build applications for IoT and the Edge.

Our software platform helps developers build, deploy and manage code on connected devices. We brought Docker to embedded GNU/Linux devices in 2013 and have been building our toolkit ever since. Our core product is the balenaCloud platform, but we also maintain a variety of successful open source projects including Etcher, openBalena, balenaOS and balenaEngine and made contributions to high-exposure projects such as Docker, Electron, and AppImage. We've also recently released our first hardware product, the balenaFin.

Our technology is open, standards-based, and proven in production across a wide range of scenarios from robotics, drones, smart buildings, 3D printing, agriculture, medicine, and more. Our investors include OpenView, Threshold Ventures, Aspect Ventures, GE, and Ericsson.

Balena is a highly distributed, remote-friendly company We rely on clear communication and the rule of "assume positive intent" to help us work together across time zones, cultures and first languages. As an organization, we have little hierarchy, and organize as needed to build complex features and solve big problems.

Benefits

  • Work with extremely talented, distributed team
  • Work remotely
  • Flexible working hours
  • Equipment of your choice
  • Annual company gathering in an international location
  • We send you hardware for side projects!

items.title: Insurance Sales - Remote
items.content:
If you've sold Life, Health (under 65), or Auto Insurance before, you'll want to consider this unique sales opportunity.

Believe it or not, Assurance's top 2019 Medicare agents during the Annual Election Period (the last 3 months of the year when the majority of Medicare sales happen) originally were Life agents.

Join the revolutionary ASSURANCE platform and uncap your earnings on the industry’s best work from home Medicare sales platform, selling Medicare Advantage, Supplement, and Prescription Drug plans to inbound, in-market shoppers.

We have just opened up 500 spots nationally for experienced Medicare agents to join our platform by May 29th.Spots are filling up fast! COVID-19 is changing the way all Medicare is sold, but Assurance was built from the ground up as a next-generation solution for times like these.

Join the ASSURANCE platform, and take advantage of:

  • 100% remote; you log in when you’re ready to sell.
  • Assurance pays both commissions and production bonuses. There are no caps on how much you can make.
  • Free calls via inbound shoppers generated from ASSURANCE-owned and operated websites, television commercials, and direct mail. Our Guides prospect calls and transfer interested and qualified prospect to you.
  • Access to our proprietary billion-dollar software platform at no cost to you. The platform has all the tools to empower you to succeed!
  • Contract with leading national carriers such as Humana, Aetna, UnitedHealthcare, and more.

You are in total control as you work remotely from the comfort of your home or office. Calls are always flowing on the ASSURANCE platform; when you log in you are put in front of interested consumers ready to talk to you. You’re not spending time prospecting and appointment setting, buying your own leads to dial, or sitting in a call center for 8 hours per day waiting for the phone to ring. You are your own boss and you’re surrounded online by other top performers just like you.

The Assurance system has eliminated industry inefficiencies and will provide you with free training & scripting, back office accounting & customer service, tech support, recommendation and quoting engines, and custom analytics on your performance. Now you see why we were called “the Uber of insurance” when we were acquired by Prudential Financial (NYSE: PRU) for $3.5B in 2019.

Requirements to access ASSURANCE Medicare platform as 1 of 500 elite producers:

  • AHIP certification
  • 3+ insurance state licenses
  • High-speed Internet, reliable computer, and headset with microphone
  • History of compliant insurance sales practice

Job Types: Contract, Commission

items.title: Vanilla: Sales Engineer
items.content:
Sales Engineer


Vanilla is looking for an experienced Sales Engineer to join our fully remote team in building estate planning tools – for advisors, lawyers, and their clients. We're a growing group of designers, developers, attorneys, financial advisors, and operations managers, who share a passion for building beautifully designed products for an outdated industry. Because we are a small team, we're looking for someone who can wear many different hats, be an owner and leader of their domain, and work collaboratively to create an epic sales approach to grow our business. On our team, you will have a serious impact on our company's trajectory and the story we tell about ourselves.



We are looking for a Sales Engineer to consult by telephone and email with prospective customers, who are mainly financial advisors. We are deluged with new prospects every day. Help us! As a Vanilla Sales Engineer you will build and generate a pipeline (Sales Qualified Leads) and will connect with those leads through email, calls, and use other marketing tools to qualify leads and schedule demos for financial advisors at wealth management firms across the country. This is truly a blended role of Sales and Relationship Management.




Responsibilities include:


  • Conduct qualification calls with financial advisors and manage all incoming communication.

  • Clearly and simply explain our technology to customers, breaking down complex information in a way they can understand, and decide if we are the right solution for them.

  • Maintain positive relationships with customers and prospects, understanding needs and listening for areas of improvement, change and opportunities to build greater partnerships.


  • Establish repeatable processes and procedures that will serve as the foundation of our sales strategy.


  • Work collaboratively with the Vanilla team to develop and implement prospecting strategies.


  • Connect with our list of warm leads and engage with new interest by telephone, email and demos.


  • Qualify and convert leads (via website, referrals, in-app trials, etc).


  • Track and help prospects continue through the pipeline.


  • Assist with client onboarding.


  • Identify and suggest improvements to our products and support systems.

  • Work collaboratively with product, design, support, and marketing.




Specific (Near Term) Projects/Tasks


  • Sales Process & Pipeline: Establish repeatable processes and procedures that will serve as the foundation of our sales strategy. Review and update existing materials to ensure consistent messaging and tone throughout our campaigns and supporting documentation.


  • Emails: Collaborate with our copywriters and marketing to build an email schedule/strategy to deliver valuable content to advisors throughout the sales pipeline for various audiences: clients, lawyers, advisors, etc.


  • Learning the Industry: Quickly learn and build a strong working knowledge of the complex industry of estate planning, financial advising and be able to "talk the talk". This is likely going to be your greatest challenge as our customer base is knowledgeable and will have complex questions regarding the estate planning process.



Qualifications

  • 3-5+ years Saas or Enterprise level sales experience, ideally in a blended, technical sales role


  • Excellent writing and communication skills: able to craft strategic emails, build strong relationships over the phone and conduct informative and engaging demos explaining our software.


  • Experience writing for a relevant audience: technology experience preferred


  • Teamwork and collaboration: Ability to foster strong working relationships with team members and cross-functional partners


Why Vanilla

You'll love it here! Vanilla is a great place to enjoy the perks of working remotely while advancing your career. Here are a few reasons why:

  • A modern, collaborative and respectful work environment


  • An opportunity to have your voice heard and make real impact on the company's trajectory


  • The chance to have accomplished, driven, and passionate individuals as co-workers


  • Paid time off, health insurance, and healthcare spending or reimbursement accounts such as FSAs


If you think you might be a fit for this role and for our team then we’d love to talk.


Email your resume AND a letter to hiring@justvanilla.com letting us know why you would be great for the job (must have letter explaining why you are a great candidate!) The first line of the cover letter must have the following information: "My favorite ice cream flavor is ______." This helps us filter who read the entire post – we said we needed someone who is detail oriented, didn’t we?

items.title: Business Development Genie - BDM
items.content:
Company Overview 


 


Ocushield develops products which limit harmful blue light from screens, protecting eyes and improving sleep. Developed by an optometrist while studying at university, Ocushield has sold over 100,000 + products worldwide and is used by employees at JP Morgan and NHS as well this, Ocushield has been featured in Forbes, The Guardian, Evening Standard and Digital Trends. Ocushield is on a mission to protect peoples eyes in the digital age, one family at a time. With increased screen time due to isolation, we've seen an increased demand in our products and want someone to join us on our growth trajectory.


 


Role Overview 


Reporting directly to the founder, your mission will be to help conduct outreach and establish leads. You will then warm up the leads by touching base via video calls, or email to provide information and value on why Ocushield products can work well for them.


Leads could be retailers, IT distributors, schools, HR department, well-being providers, etailers, health and safety and governments.


Content and product for outreach is ready. We just need the energy and willingness of a business development manager to push this through.






  • BACKGROUND OF THE IDEAL CANDIDATE



    • A native level of English


    • Business development experience 1-3 years in work or study



    • Active LinkedIn profile


    • An excellent command of written English (impeccable spelling and grammar)




    • A strong interest in B2C and B2B marketing, with a good understanding of business etiquette








    A great curiosity, a lot of energy and a real work ethic


    Above all, you are ambitious and are not afraid of challenges!

    This is a fully remote role for 3 months where it may lead to a full-time position.

Remote

Job Title:

Work at Home-Sales & Service Rep-South Dakota

Job Description

This position interfaces with customers via inbound calls, outbound calls, or through the Internet depending upon client requirements. This position provides customer service support and resolution of routine problems regarding client’s product or services.

(Note: We are hiring from the entire state of South Dakota, not just one city or region.)

You might be asking yourself: Who is Concentrix?

Concentrix, is a technology-enabled global business services company specializing in customer engagement and improving business performance for some of the world’s best brands. Every day, from more than 40 countries and across 6 continents, our staff delivers next generation customer experience and helps companies better connect with their customers. We create better business outcomes and differentiate our clients through technology, design, data, process, and people. Concentrix provides services to clients in ten industry verticals: automotive; banking and financial services; insurance; healthcare; technology; consumer electronics; media and communications; retail and e-commerce; travel and transportation; energy and public sector. We are Different by Design.

Exactly what do we do? Instead of working in a traditional call center environment, our Concentrix Anywhere program hires sales & service agents who work from home. For example, when you call the customer service department for your cell phone or cable provider, you just might be talking to a Concentrix home based customer service & sales agent – answering that call on behalf of one of our clients. These calls might involve billing questions, changes or cancellation of services, inquiries on the status of an order, troubleshooting services etc.

In order to provide that customer support and services to our brands, we need YOU!

Why Concentrix Anywhere?

We offer paid training and employee benefits too! You can save a lot of money and time. There is no gas to purchase, no bad weather to drive through, and no eating out, coffee or snacks to purchase daily.

Concentrix Culture

Our culture is made of nine statements that we use as a guiding principle for our everyday business!

  • We are FANATICAL about our clients & staff
  • We have HIGH INTEGRITY with exemplary character
  • We are TENACIOUS in our pursuit of excellence
  • We value KNOWLEDGE, OPENNESS and TRANSPARENCY
  • We have CONTRARIAN views on how to run a business
  • We are BOLD in our decisions
  • We are DISRUPTIVE in the marketplace
  • We INVEST in the future
  • We all CONTRIBUTE and are one Concentrix

Where Are We Hiring?

We are currently hiring in 35 states (see full list of locations on our website).

This particular job requisition is only for (South Dakota) residents. If you are not physically residing in South Dakota, please do not apply to this requisition. Please visit our website and apply to the appropriate state requisition.

We have three types of work at home positions that we hire for regularly: Sales & Service, Customer service and Technical Support Representatives. Every position we have is centered on providing excellent Customer Service and some positions are more sales or technically focused. Your answers to the questions during the application process, your qualifications and your experience will all be reviewed as part of the evaluation process to determine which one is the best fit for you.

Minimum Requirements/Additional Info:

High School Diploma or GED and at least one year of customer service experience (One year of sales experience required if you want to be considered for a Sales position).

  • We need you to have your own PC and high speed Internet service, both of which will be tested as part of the application process. You can work from a laptop, but will need to be hard-wired while working.
  • Your monitor will need to be between 17 to 21.5 inches; requirements varies by client (capable of 1280 x 766). A flat panel display is highly recommended, the use of a televisions will need to be verified upon hire. (External monitors are permitted for laptops)
  • A quiet, distraction-free, location in your home to work.
  • A telephone, landline or cell is required based on position offered.
  • All positions may require the purchasing of equipment from headset, flash drive to dual monitors. They are not required as part of the application process, so please do not purchase them before we extend a job offer to you.
  • A strong candidate will be computer/Internet savvy, comfortable operating in several applications simultaneously.
  • We need you to be a “people person” who enjoys talking and assisting others. Think about how much you enjoy receiving excellent customer service yourself? Well, we need you to take pride in providing that same great service to others.
  • We require 7 days/week availability, as customer service is something that is provided by most companies every day of the week.
  • Schedules vary and will be discussed during the interview.
  • Great benefit options include: medical, dental & vision benefits, and 401K. We also offer attendance based wage increases, performance bonuses, and some programs include sales incentives.

Equipment and Internet Speeds vary based on client needs, completion of the computer test will need to be submitted to determine compatibility, failing a portion of pc testing does not necessarily disqualify you from consideration*

Career Framework Role
Has program required basic skill set to perform routine tasks within simple processes but lacking program/product specific knowledge. Works with close supervision and clearly defined procedures. Starting to demonstrate familiarity with client terminology, operating standards and procedures. Starter without sustained metric performance levels.

Disclaimer

The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by people assigned to this job. They are not intended to be an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, and skills required of personnel working within this job title.

Concentrix is an EEO/AA/M/F/Vet/Disability Employer.

Location: USA, SD, Work-at-Home

Time Type: Full time

Apply for job

items.title: Proposal Writer, COVID-19 Contact Tracing Program
items.content:
Remote | Freelance

Location: USA-

AM has an immediate opening for Proposal Writer to support federal, state, and local efforts to fight the COVID-19 Contact Tracing program, nationwide. This position will begin immediately. We anticipate that this resource will need to be available for up to 90 day or longer to respond to multiple RFPs.

Background: The scale and complexity of the COVID-19 outbreak has underscored the need for prompt and effective implementation of evidence-based containment measures. Contact tracing is one of the interventions that has been used to effectively control recent pandemics (Ebola, SARS), and has shown to be effective against COVID-19 mitigation in South Korea, New Zealand and elsewhere.

AM LLC has identified over 18,000 qualified and motivated candidates who have responded to our call to action to support COVID-19 response efforts. Our candidates are located throughout the U.S., come from a variety of backgrounds, and possess the skills and personal qualities necessary to work as Contact Tracers, Care Resource Coordinators, and Case Investigators.

The successful Proposal Writer will have experience writing winning proposals at the federal, state, and local levels, preferably related to health care or public health fields).

  • Interview subject matter experts to develop accurate and compelling proposal content
  • Write capabilities statements, proposals, or proposal sections (e.g., past performance or technical content)
  • Participate in, support, coordinate, and/or lead color team reviews
  • Develop proposal calendars and responsibility matrices to assign roles and responsibilities in proposal development, manage proposal schedule
  • Create compliance matrices and ensure proposals are compliant with solicitation requirements, completed on time and to a high-quality standard
  • Review and copy-edit proposals and/or capabilities statements
  • Develop compelling visuals, best practices, and templates

Required Qualifications:

  • 5+ years of experience writing and coordinating proposals for similar professional service areas (public health, clinical, and health care).
  • Bachelor’s degree in related field
  • Exceptional writing and editing skills, strong organizational skills, and attention to detail a must
  • Ability to work and communicate with interdisciplinary staff
  • Ability to manage multiple pursuits concurrently while meeting deadlines

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Specific Proposal and/or Business Development training and/or certification
  • Association for Proposal Management Professional (APMP) certification

ID: 2020-2004
Division: COVID-19 Contact Tracing Program

External Company URL: http://www.appliedmemeticsllc.com/

items.title: Localize: Senior Account Executive - B2B SaaS
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=1, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=4}
items.content:
Senior Account Executive - B2B SaaS

Localizeis looking for a personable, energetic and versatile Senior Account Executive to join our US-based remote team. Our company has product-market fit (500+ customers) and is now looking to scale our sales and growth efforts. This opportunity is perfect for an entrepreneurial minded individual who has experience working as an account manager / account executive / sales rep in B2B SaaS. If you have a true interest in B2B software technology and want to be on the front lines of a growing SaaS company, please apply. 

As a Senior Account Executive, you will take ownership of our continued success in revenue growth and be responsible for all aspects of the sales process including lead qualification, discovery calls, BANT/MEDDIC/similar, proposal preparation all the way through to contract negotiation and deal closing. You'll work together with our engineering team on opportunities that require deep technical discussion, while also being comfortable speaking about technical solutions with prospects when an engineer isn't on the call with you. You'll work with our Customer Success team (who manages accounts post-sale) to identify and pursue large account expansion opportunities within the existing customer base.

This position is only open to applicants who are eligible to work in the US.

Responsibilities:
  • Execute a repeatable  sales process beginning with lead qualification and discovery all the way through to contract negotiation and closing.
  • Build and cultivate prospect relationships by initiating communications and conducting follow-up communications in order to move opportunities through the sales funnel.
  • Utilize CRM (Copper) to track customer activities, update data, and process competitive information.
  • Generate rapport and brand awareness with new inbound leads (i.e. adding contacts, sending emails, strategic calling)
  • Conduct account research and continue to engage with interested companies
  • Demo products to prospective customers and conduct discovery calls to identify customer needs and solutions
  • Prepare proposals, SOW’s, and sales presentations for prospective customers
  • Work together with our Customer Success team to identify and pursue enterprise upsell / expansion opportunities
  • Report weekly sales forecasts and performance metrics 
Experience and Qualifications:
  • At least 2 consecutive years of remote work experience (mandatory)
  • 6+ years experience in an enterprise/SaaS sales capacity
  • Track record of selling and closing technical solutions to enterprise accounts in the $25k - $150k deal range
  • Strong understanding of software technology and terminology, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Self-directed, highly organized working style; doesn’t let things fall through the cracks
  • Demonstrated success in exceeding sales goals and expectations
  • Exceptional written and oral communication skills 
  • Comfortable speaking clearly and concisely in real-time presentation environments
  • Ability to develop a solution-led conversation at the C-Suite level
  • Strong negotiating skills and closing techniques.
  • Ability to execute, meet deadlines and manage multiple priorities concurrently
To apply:
Along with your resume, send us a cover letter that showcases your personality and tells us why we should hire you. Previous experience working in a remote position is a must.

items.title: Inside Sales Representative
items.content:
Remote

This is a 100% REMOTE position done from your home office. This position services customers in the Western United States. No cold calling; this position works with existing accounts and new business sales leads.

We are looking for bright, highly-skilled and talented sales people. This is a great opportunity for someone with a high interest in technology, who loves sales and is willing to train to become the best. If you have experience as a systems administrator or solutions engineer and have wanted to expand into technology sales this is an ideal position for you.

Join the world leader in software-only storage performance solutions for virtual and physical server environments. Condusiv Technologies products are used by 90% of the Fortune 1000 and almost three-quarters of the Forbes Global 100 to increase business productivity and reduce data center costs while extending the life of existing hardware. 35 years in business with over 100 million licenses sold, Condusiv has stayed ahead of technology trends and continues to innovate products that are in demand.

Compensation: 30K base pay, plus commissions. Condusiv strives to hire highly productive individuals who produce outstanding volumes of sales to enable the total compensation to reach up to $70,000 – $100,000 in annual on-target earnings.

Key Duties and Responsibilities:

  • Works with existing customers to ensure they are running the latest version and fully abreast of the benefits they are receiving while uncovering and developing upsell and cross-sell opportunities to expand within the account.
  • Develops new sales opportunities from leads generated by marketing campaigns.
  • Keeps a complete record of all sales activities in Sales Force according to guidelines and best practices established by management.
  • Continually works to increase sales proficiency through study and practice. Stays abreast of current trends and developments in the IT world in order to have relevant discussions with customers and prospects. Becomes intimately familiar with Condusiv’s products, case-studies, technical requirements, features and benefits.

Requirements:

  • A high interest in and familiarization with technology
  • Proven success in a previous comparable sales position
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, high-pressure sales environment and to achieve quotas
  • Strong written and verbal communication and presentation skills
  • Proficient with Microsoft Office applications and Salesforce or similar CRM
  • Must be coachable and a quick study

Recommended:

  • 3 or more years of B2B selling experience to IT professionals
  • Conversant with modern storage and virtualization technologies: basic understanding of data centers, virtualization and SAN technology.
  • BS/BA in Marketing, Business Administration or related

In addition to the technical knowledge, experience and competence required of an Inside Sales Representative company’s employees must also possess a personal aptitude for solving problems, high intelligence, perseverance and orderliness, responsibility, drive toward and satisfaction at the attainment of goals, calmness and endurance under stressful conditions, consistency and predictability in the regular attendance of duty, individual initiative as well as participation in group efforts, correct estimation of specific circumstances and an absence of unconstructive or ill-considered criticism, fairness, empathy and appreciation toward fellow workers and effective communications skills.

Apply for job

items.content:
Work from Home Entry Level Sales Representatives
Vector Marketing is currently holding virtual interviews for entry level sales rep positions. Our representatives have an opportunity to work from home selling Cutco products through one on one appointments that emphasizes customer service. Experience is not necessary because our online training is designed to help people do well immediately - as long as someone is willing to learn, they can be successful.
We provide flexible schedules for anyone looking to make some extra income during this unpredictable time. This entry level sales position is a great opportunity for college students and 2020 high school graduates looking for summer work.
What we offer:
Excellent pay competitive starting base pay, commissions available based on performance
Solid training we teach our reps how to do well in this role before they start, and offer continued support and additional training as time goes on. (Many of our top representatives had never had a real job before working with us.)
Flexible scheduling we help our reps create a schedule that works for them. Some work as much as possible while others choose to be super part time around other commitments such as online classes or other jobs.
Choice of location most interviews and trainings take place online through virtual interviews and training, reps can conveniently work from home.
What we require:
Enjoy working with people
At least 18 years old or 17 and a 2020 HS Graduate
Conditions apply
Able to start at least on a part time basis within the next 7 10 days
Willing to learn and apply new skills.
Who would do well:
People who have done well with us in the past have had experience in retail, fast food, cashier, call center or telemarketing (which by the way, we don t do), administrative assistant, receptionist/office work, landscaping, and in just about any field you can imagine. We welcome all applicants who have a positive attitude and are willing to work hard and learn new things.
This entry level sales position is a great fit for people who are looking for part time or a full time remote work. If you are a student looking for summer work or just someone who is looking for a flexible schedule, our opportunities can work around your needs. Because of the quality of our training, we re able to take on people who are still in school or who entered the job market right out of high school and train them to quickly become successful.
If you think you would be a great fit for our sales team fill out the contact information and a receptionist will follow up with you about setting up a virtual interview with a manager.

tags: DBG:surround``OR(eastern, east, est, edt, newyork) 3W OR(time,timezon)
DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=16, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Enterprise eCommerce Sales Executive

Are you an experienced and dynamic sales professional who enjoys prospecting, establishing long-term relationships, and closing new business? Do you have previous experience developing leads and meeting quotas? Do you want to use your expertise to collaborate with our sales and marketing teams to drive growth for our agency? We’d love to have you join us!

The Sales Development Representative will build a pipeline of prospects and acquire new clients to achieve company lead goals. This position will report to the CEO, seeking and qualifying new business opportunities by developing relationships with potential customers.

As a Sales Development Representative, you will have an outstanding opportunity to be an integral part of our success with a base salary, rewarding commission structure, and benefits.

We’re looking for an ambitious business development expert, who has outstanding communication and collaboration skills, pay attention to detail and have experience driving business through email and good-old-fashioned phone calls. If you’re motivated, results-driven, and enjoy working in a team environment, we’d like to meet you.

This position is full-time, and remote (USA based). It will operate during our business hours in the Eastern Time Zone.

Our Enterprise eCommerce Sales Executive’s responsibilities will include:

  • Proactively seeking new business opportunities in the market using outbound emails, LinkedIn outreach, phone calls, and more
  • Executing marketing-created lead generation campaigns to drive net new revenue opportunities
  • Documenting and communicating specific KPIs and delivering these, along with strategy recommendations, to sales leadership
  • Identifying clients’ pain points and leveraging them into opportunities by establishing goals to address them
  • Employing established sales strategies designed to push beyond gatekeepers and delivering tailored messaging that engages key decision makers
  • Learning and practicing an extensive knowledge of our service offerings creatively and effectively
  • Engaging executives in targeted prospect accounts
  • Building long-term, trusting relationships with prospects and clients
  • Connecting warm prospective clients with Sales Directors to generate new business opportunities
  • Consistently meeting quarterly and annual MQL & SQL and opportunity goals
  • Managing and maintaining a pipeline of interested prospects, then creating weekly, monthly, and quarterly metrics reports
  • Leveraging our CRM and other sales tools to prospect in specific verticals and territories
  • Collaborating with all internal and cross-functional team members

To be successful in this role, you’ll have:

  • 4-6 years of proven experience as a Business/Sales Development Representative or similar role
  • eCommerce agency experience
  • Enterprise eCommerce Platform Experience i.e. worked at magento, bigcommerce, shopify
  • Experience selling Magento, Shopify or BigCommerce
  • Experience selling Conversion Optimization or Managed Services
  • Experience practicing ownership over personal pipeline and lead generation
  • The ability to initiate conversations through cold-calling and other outreach tactics
  • Experience with creating engaging and personalized outbound drip email campaigns
  • The ability to segment CRM data into vertical-specific prospect lists
  • Appropriate judgment to decide when to push ahead or take an initiative in a different direction
  • The ability to discern campaign success and collaborate to determine alternative options
  • Demonstrated proof of a fundamental understanding of technologies and platforms used
  • The ability to complete work on time and continually communicate progress
  • A passion for creating clear sales documentation and collateral including, but not limited to, call notes, discovery notes, CRM records, proposals, and beyond
  • The ability to consistently deliver qualified leads that produce meaningful opportunities
  • Excellent communication, negotiation, and networking skills
  • People-person skills, an emulous attitude, and problem-solving mindset
  • The ability to deliver engaging presentations
  • An interest in traveling as needed for client meetings, events, and trade shows
It’s a plus if you:

  • Have experience selling enterprise software systems
  • Have experience with Shopify Plus/Workarea/CRO/Marketing
  • Excel and CRM (such as Salesforce) experience

Salary is commensurate with experience.

In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.

--

What can Noticed offer me?

  • We invest in our team of doers, thinkers, and risk-takers, who share a never-settle attitude.
  • We offer healthcare, dental and vision benefits and contribute up to 70% to employee premiums.
  • We provide paid time off and company holidays.
  • We actively curate a monthly and yearly team culture calendar.
  • We are an equal opportunity employer and foster an inclusive environment. We welcome people from diverse backgrounds and perspectives to apply to our positions.
We can’t wait to hear from you!

items.title: Shogun: Sales Executive
items.content:
Sales Executive

We are: Shogun, a software company building tools for the next generation of eCommerce companies. We were in the Winter 2018 batch of Y-Combinator, and we have over 12,000 active paying clients on our inaugural product, Shogun Page Builder.

We are looking for a Sales Executive to join our team and sell our new software product, Shogun Frontend, to eCommerce companies!

Shogun Frontend helps eCommerce companies build online stores that have sub second page load time- which boosts conversion rate. The codeless content management tools in Shogun Frontend empower marketing and merchandising team do work that was previously exclusive to developers.

More about that exciting news in this article from TechCrunch!

This is a new product, founding sales team, and uncapped commissions. Entrepreneurial salespeople are strongly encouraged to read on :)


In This Role You Will...
  • Have a direct impact on the business, and there will be an opportunity to grow your career as our team expands.
  • Own revenue focused goals and hold yourself accountable to hit key results.
  • Build your book of business; a driven person who "defaults to action" will be most successful in this role!

You Have...
  • 2+ years of experience in SaaS (software as a service) sales.
  • Experience with meticulously maintaining leads and opportunities in CRM platform.
  • A proven track record of hitting and exceeding revenue focused key results.
  • Demonstrated ability to write compelling email outreach sequences and thoughtful email follow up that is add-value for the prospect.

Preferred Skills...
  • Aptitude for learning how software works, and leading software demonstrations for clients.
  • Strong note taking abilities; create clear action items, and execute follow up.
  • Exceptional active listening skills, with a true desire to help clients.
  • Tenacious, positive, and earnest personality.

We Offer...
  • Role is base + commission on a 50/50 split with uncapped upside on commissions
  • Benefits (vary by location)
  • Co-working office reimbursement
  • A highly skilled and dedicated team that is fun to work with.
  • Remote work – We are a fully distributed team
  • Occasionally we hire on a full time contractor basis to begin with. Team members enjoy the same opportunities for great compensation, full time positions, and consideration, regardless of location.

Shogun Values
  • Work in the open: Operate with high integrity and choose what's right over what's easy. Be transparent as a company and with each other.
  • People are People: Treat yourself, colleagues, and customers with dignity, empathy, and respect. Start from a presumption of positive intent.
  • Win and grow together: Strive to be the best, individually and as a team. Support and encourage each other. Seek opportunities for growth.

Shogun supports workplace diversity and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender identity/expression, national origin, age, military service eligibility, veteran status, sexual orientation, marital status, physical or mental disability, or any other protected class

items.content:
Account Manager

Overview


With over 10,000 online merchants launching subscriptions and over 1,000,000 subscribers powered by ReCharge, we have a lot of store owners to support. Our mission to make repeat orders easier began five years ago as a bootstrapped startup and today we're at the forefront of recurring billing software with over 175 remote-first employees around the globe processing hundreds of millions of dollars in sales every month.


We're looking for an Account Manager to join our team who is resourceful and will use their consultative, troubleshooting, analytical and people skills to support our ReCharge PRO merchants. The Account Management team is critical to the success of our business and by working with a small portfolio of merchants, you will make an immediate impact building long term relationships and helping them drive business results.


What You'll Do

  • Live by and champion our values: #ownership, #empathy, #simple-solutions.
  • Take ownership for accounts and participate in Account Manager department meetings discussing movements, issues and needs for other PRO accounts.
  • Prioritize and advocate for PRO customers and deliver solutions for their accounts. 
  • Advocate for improvements to quickly resolve issues and needs, enabling ReCharge usage to be more efficient, faster and seamless.
  • Work tickets from the priority queue from your accounts.
  • Take note of and work on innovative solutions for critical customer issues.
  • Collaborate with Account Management teammates to address issues and consistently improve our offering.
  • Proactively participate in phone calls and meetings with customers.

What You'll Bring

  • Typically, 2-4 years of experience managing enterprise SaaS accounts in a fast paced technology driven company
  • Experience offering consultative, white glove support to accounts.
  • Experience managing accounts within e-commerce and a passion for the industry
  • Excellent relationship management, communication and negotiating skills
  • A sense of urgency and desire to go above and beyond to provide solutions for our customers
  • Resourcefulness: you'll figure out what needs to be done and find ways to make it happen
  • Ability to work remotely and desire to make an impact at a boot-strapped start-up
  • A practical approach to address unexpected issues with out-of-the-box solutions
  • Highly proficient with MS Excel, CSV 
  • Bachelors degree or equivalent experience desired

items.title: 10x Factory: Sales Consultant
items.content:
Sales Consultant

10x Factory is looking for a sales consultant to join our small but insanely talented remote team to help onboard new applicants. This is an inbound sales role - demand for access to this community is incredibly high and we are inundated with inbound leads. We need your help to screen applicants, collect payment information and onboard new members.

What is 10x Factory?

10x Factory Is the fastest growing private Slack community for world-class entrepreneurs. Moderated and co-founded by a serial entrepreneur whose previous companies have generated hundreds of millions of sales, this community has 1 mission: Help its members 10x their growth -- and not in a hypothetical manner but in a true meaning of the word. Whether it's learning how to build a scalable, repeatable customer acquisition model, raising capital, structuring partner deals, building sales teams or even just dealing with personal work / life challenges, there's no other community in the world quite like this.

10x Factory is strictly for serious entrepreneurs and we maintain a strong bar of quality across the board. There is currently billions of valuation in our community.

You can learn more here: http://www.10xfactory.com/

What We're Looking For

We have an incredibly high bar for talent - we are looking for nothing short of an incredibly talented, self motivated sales consultant who is passionate about entrepreneurship and helping us continue to build and foster the 10x Factory community.

You will possess an uncanny ability to build rapport with entrepreneurs who apply to join the network and help them recognize the massive value in the community, having them sign up (this is an exclusive paid access membership) and assisting with onboarding and intros.

We have an unlimited number of inbound and very warm leads/applicants to the community so this role is strictly for a consultant that loves being rewarded for hard work.

What You Will Do

You'll be handed over hundreds of inbound leads (people who've applied to join) - you will contact, build rapport and onboard people daily. You will build a stellar follow up program for people who are not yet ready to join and you will drive significant and rapid revenue growth while sharing in the rewards.

This is a 100% remote opportunity but you will be required to work across the US timezone mostly but also across other timezones as we have many international members and applicants - flexibility is an absolute must.

Intro

Landing.jobs is a tech recruitment marketplace dedicated to matchmaking the top tech talent with the right tech companies.

Are you looking for a first job opportunity and willing to improve your business skills? So, go ahead and take a glimpse!

We're now hiring a Junior Business Developer to join our amazing PT Market Team. You will find yourself in a dynamic and challenging environment to work alongside an international team with a very powerful mission: help talented people land great tech jobs and help them in their careers.

Once you jump into our Business Development team, which takes care of the companies side of the marketplace, you will be responsible for:

  • Having a deep understanding of our product, business model, and partnerships to support the entire team (yup, we are a startup, so be ready to get your hands dirty while supporting different teams!)
  • Communicating with employers that are searching for tech talent
  • Cultivating existing accounts and relationships
  • Identifying open cross-selling opportunities
  • Recommending potential products or services to the management team by collecting customer information and analyzing their needs
  • Most Importantly, helping our clients to hire their tech dream teams!

How will you do this? With the help of our amazing team and, of course, your creativity!

If you are passionate about what you do and you appreciate being accountable for work that actually matters, Landing.jobs is the place to be :)

Main requirements

  • Recently graduated (we are willing to teach you some cool stuff!), with a bachelor or Masters degree in Management, Economics, Engineering or any other related field
  • Fluent in English & Portuguese, both written and spoken
  • Collaborative, fast-moving, and comfortable with change
  • A natural communicator with outstanding interpersonal skills
  • Ambitious and goal-oriented but also customer driven

Nice to have

  • Interested in supporting and helping people
  • Interested in the Tech
  • Eligible for an IEFP program

Benefits & Perks

  • Health and Dental Insurance
  • Budget for monthly professional skill training
  • Career development mapping
  • Free Fruit, Coffee, and Tea
  • Extra Day off for Employee of the Month
  • Employee Discounts + Birthday Gift Voucher (for food, gym, pharmacy, outside of work activities, and travel)
  • Bi-weekly Team Building/Bonding Activities (Lunch, organized events, learning sessions etc.)
  • Homemade snacks and treats shared by members of the team :)

Remote Details

Candidates Timezone in GMT Timezone
